DOC.brief_summary: Purpose study test whether adalimumab induce clinical remission subject active Crohn 's disease compare placebo ( inactive substance )
DOC.brief_title: A Study Human Anti-TNF Antibody Adalimumab Induction Clinical Remission Subjects With Crohn 's Disease
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : Diagnosis Crohn 's disease CDAI score baseline 220 450 Normal laboratory parameter Willing able give inform consent Exclusion : Diagnosis ulcerative colitis Women pregnant breastfeed No previous use infliximab antiTNF antagonists No previous history tuberculosis listeria infection No previous history cancer successfully treat skin cancer
